Lingokids | full stack, backend | Madrid | full-time, on-site | VISA | www.lingokids.com

We want to teach a lesson to the stagnant EdTech market: Learning should be fun!

We're an award-winning company helping parents raise bilingual kids at home. We create a safe environment for children 2-6 where learning just happens. We're currently helping over a million families world wide.

We’re looking for senior engineers with at least 3 years of experience to join our development team.

We work primarily with Ruby on Rails / Redis / MySQL on top of AWS services (EC2, Cloudfront, S3, etc).

Interesting problems around adaptive learning for Pre-Ks, growing scaling/performance challenges with millions of behavioural events, etc.

Required skills:

• Well-rounded engineer (data structures, algorithms, clean code, etc). • Care deeply about your work and about the success of your projects. • Relentless in finding simple, elegant solutions to complex problems. • The more active you are on Github, Bitbucket, etc, the better!

Interested? Send us an email with your CV to jobs@lingokids.com
